A mai napon ünnepeljük Magyarország újkori történetének egyik meghatározó eseményét, az 1848-49-es forradalom és szabadságharcot, amely a nemzeti identitásunk egyik alapköve.

Ezen neves nap alkalmával úgy határoztunk, hogy meglepjük a magyar pilótákat egy eventsorozattal:
  • 14:00-16:00 óra között: Spaceball
  • 17:00-18:00 óra között: Admin vs. User
  • 18:00-20:00 óra között: Level Invasion Gate
  • Ingyenes javítás egész nap
  • Különleges bónuszdobozok egész nap

Jó szórakozást kívánunk az ünnepnapra!
A mai napon ünnepeljük Magyarország újkori történetének egyik meghatározó eseményét, az 1848-49-es forradalom és szabadságharcot, amely a nemzeti identitásunk egyik alapköve.

Üdv, Űrpilóták!

Ezen neves nap alkalmával úgy határoztunk, hogy meglepjük a magyar pilótákat egy eventsorozattal:
  • 13:00-15:00 óra között: Level Invasion Gate
  • 16:00-18:00 óra között: Spaceball
  • 19:00-22:00 óra között: Sector Control
  • Ingyenes javítás egész nap
  • Különleges bónuszdobozok egész nap

Jó szórakozást kívánunk az ünnepnapra!
Отметим 23 февраля захватывающими турнирами и особыми бонусными коробками с российской символикой!

Здравия желаем, защитники космического Отечества!

Пилоты, ваша Родина – это космос, и ваша первостепенная задача – защищать её от посягательств любых непрошеных гостей. Чтобы не терять боевой формы и по первому звонку быть готовыми ринуться в бой, в День защитника Отечества мы устраиваем особые космические учения!

Только на российских серверах DarkOrbit 23-го февраля с 00:01 до 23:59 часов по московскому времени пройдёт акция во имя мужества и преданности космической Отчизне!

Отточите свои боевые навыки в уровневых интервент-портах с 18:00 до 21:00 по Москве, а с 22:00 до 01:00 вам понадобится второе дыхание для участия в Скормагеддоне! Попутно ищите специальные бонусные коробки с символикой российского флага! В подарок на День защитника Отечества дроиды будут неуязвимы на протяжении всей акции!

На вас вся надежда, защитники!
As is befitting of Saint Patrick's Day, the entire day is one big party in DarkOrbit!

The Irish are a colorful people and what better way to mark St. Patrick's Day than to turn everything in the universe green! Collect boxes with laser ammo, rockets, energy, uridium and lots of additional items all day long!

What would a holiday celebration in DarkOrbit be without a proper shootout? Absolutely nothing! That's why there are two games to take on. First test yourself against fellow pilots in Team Death Match! And then there is Level Invasion Gate where survival is the name of the game! Here you will be forced to display a great deal of stamina and durability as throngs of opponents keep coming and coming.

And as the Irish are a peaceable lot, all normal ship repairs are free the entire day! Let your inner daredevil out!

Engage your engines and hit max throttle on a day full of prizes and action!

Happy Saint Patrick's Day!
Independence Day: the action-packed holiday celebration!
The 4th of July in DarkOrbit - come and celebrate America's Independence Day!

Greetings space pilot,

Today we are celebrating Independence Day in DarkOrbit Reloaded. There are tons of fireworks just waiting around to be shot into the sky. To mark the occasion, DarkOrbit has all sorts of exciting events and surprises lined up:

  • The Independence Goliath Design will be available all day long at the special discount price in the payment section.
  • Level Invasion Gate from from 2:00 p.m. and 5:00 p.m. (local server time)
  • Spaceball 7:00 p.m. and 10:00 p.m. (local server time)
  • Invulnerable Drones Your drones will not receive any damage during the entire event.
  • All day long fireworks will be available in the shop.

Come out, party hard and get in on this action-packed day!
Good luck, pilot!
Захватываюшие турниры и бонусные коробки с российской символикой в память о первом полёте человека в космос

Здравия желаем, пилоты-космонавты!

53 года тому назад в космос полетел первый в мире человек и облетел планету Земля за 108 минут. Им был никто иной, как наш соотечественник и отважный парень Юрий Гагарин! С тех вся страна отмечает День космонавтики, в честь которого команда DarkOrbit приготовила для вас увлекательнейшие турниры и особенные призы!

Весь день 12 апреля с 00:01 до 23:59 по Моске мы будем чтить на российских серверах DarkOrbit память первого космонавта и совершать достойные его подвиги!

Продемонстрируйте свои боевые навыки в матчах "Контроля за сектором" с 17:00 до 20:00 по Москве, а с 21:00 до 00:00 вам понадобится второе дыхание для отражения нападения Ice Meteoroids. Попутно ищите специальные бонусные коробки с символикой российского флага! В подарок на День космонавтики дроиды будут неуязвимы на протяжении всей акции!

Покорите космос заново в знаменательный день 12 апреля!!
Commemorating the first flight of a human into space

On the 12th of April 1961, Yuri Gagarin was the first human in the history of mankind to leave the boundaries of Earth’s gravity and fly into space. Thirty years later the first Space Shuttle took flight and ever since many missions were launched on this day, exploring space and pushing further and further into the great unknown.

This day is celebrated worldwide by a global community of people committed to shaping the future of space exploration.

We too want to join in and so today from midnight to midnight, this on-day event will celebrated on all servers with

  • Fireworks
  • Drones take no damage
  • Bonus boxes on 1-1 to 3-8, 4-x and 5-x included
  • Plus more
Celebrate spring with DarkOrbit, and enjoy some fresh, fast-paced action!

Hello Space Pilots,

DarkOrbit calls for action to welcome May. Light up the sky with fireworks to celebrate and collect valuable items from event bonus boxes.

Keep an eye out for Sector Control from 10 am until 12 pm, followed by the Level Invasion Gate from 1 pm until 3 pm. If that weren’t enough, Team Death Match will run from 4 pm until 6 pm and Spaceball from 7 pm until 10 pm. All stated times are local server time.

Of course, drones will not take damage the whole event.

So, lock, load and enjoy!

We're celebrating Columbus Day together! Join in the celebration by playing mini-games, or if you prefer to make a bang as you set off gorgeous fireworks, look for them in Bonus Boxes and in the Shop! Have fun!

Greetings Space Pilots,

On May 9th, 1945, one of the worst military conflicts in our history came to an end. Today, we'd like to take the time to honor the memory of the victims and help lay the foundation for a better future.

There will, of course, also be time for fun and action. Between 2pm and 4pm, an exciting competition will be taking place in the Level Invasion Gate and, from 6pm to 8pm, Sector Control is on the menu.

There will be free repairs all day and drones won't take damage. You can also collect special boxes in the color and design of your national flag.

See you out on the maps!
Celebrate Poland's Independence Day with DarkOrbit!

What better way to celebrate Poland's Independence Day than with fireworks, games, and prizes? Keep a sharp eye out for Bonus Boxes colored like the Polish flag, as they can drop fireworks (among other great prizes)! If you can't wait to set off your sparklers, fireworks will also be available for purchase in the shop. Best of all, you can join in Level Invasion Gate, Team Deathmatch, and Spaceball games!

Happy Independence Day!
Remember, Remember - to celebrate with DarkOrbit!

What better way to celebrate Guy Fawkes Day than with fireworks, games, and prizes?
Keep a sharp eye out for Bonus Boxes that look a little like the Union Jack, as they may drop fireworks (among other brilliant prizes)! If you can't wait to set off your sparklers, fireworks will also be available for purchase in the shop.
Best of all, you can join in Sector Control and Spaceball!
Stay warm in deep space on Bonfire Night!

Who says you can’t enjoy a little turkey and stuffing in deep space? Join the celebration and enjoy our special Roast Turkey Cargo Boxes. There are special opportunities available for you to enjoy, while you make room for some piping hot pumpkin pie.

Happy Thanksgiving.
25% more honor and experience in DarkOrbit!

Hello Space Pilots,

To celebrate 19th of May, all space pilots who log into Darkorbit will receive 25% bonus HON and TP during the day!

The opportunity to gain bonus experience in all Darkorbit Turkey servers throughout the day waiting for you! Login now and enjoy the faster rise in DarkOrbit!

For more details, please check the Forum!
Der Sommer auf dem Höhepunkt im Orbit!

Hallo Space-Piloten!

Der Sommer ist auf seinem Höhepunkt und man kann die Hitze nun sogar im Orbit spüren: Am 15.08 tobt im All das Fest des Augustes!

Wir feiern exklusiv auf allen italienischen Servern ein echtes Sommerfest mit Event-Games, gratis Basis-Reparaturen und ganz besonderen italienischen Spezial Boxen!

Spielt mit beim Spaceball von 14:00 bis 16:00 Uhr und lasst es danach beim Level Invasion Gate von 18:00 bis 20:00 Uhr krachen. Wie es sich für eine richtige Feier gehört, sind natürlich alle Basis-Reparaturen umsonst und Drohnen nehmen keinen Schaden!

Schnappt Euch Eure Space-Erfrischung, genießt den Feiertag und kämpft mit!
Oslavte Den boje za svobodu a demokracii jak se patří!
DarkOrbit slaví Den boje za svobodu a demokracii spolu s Čechy!

Jak jinak oslavit Den boje za svobodu a demokracii než akcemi, ohňostroji a cenami?

Mějte oči na stopkách a hledejte bonusové boxy v národních barvách – mohou se v nich skrývat ohňostroje a jiné skvělé ceny! Pokud se vám nechce čekat, můžete si ohňostroje zakoupit přímo v obchodě.

Dále se můžete těšit na akční hry jako Brána invaze a Spaceball!

Užijte si oslavy!
The whole galaxy is celebrating this holiday!

Hello Space Pilots,

Enter the orbit and celebrate the Immaculate Conception with us all day on the 8th of December. Special Bonus Boxes are waiting for you and we’ll have Spaceball (13:00-15:00) and Team Deathmatch (21:00-23:00) events for you to enjoy.

Join now and celebrate with an action packed day!
DarkOrbit slaví den Jana Husa a vy všichni jste zváni!
Den Jana Husa ve hře DarkOrbit – vyrazte do boje za správnou věc!

Ahoj vesmírní piloti,

K uctění památky slavného kritika církve bude DarkOrbit pořádat Den Jana Husa. Vyrazte do boje za správnou věc a užijte si den plný akce a překvapení! Po celý den se můžete těšit na:
  • Speciální bonusové boxy
  • Rakety WIZ-X v obchodě

Tak na co čekáte? Vyrazte do boje za pravdu!
Liberté, égalité, fraternité - faites la révolution en orbite !

Salut, pilotes de l'espace,

Pour fêter dignement le 14 juillet, faites péter des feux d'artifice monstrueux dans l'espace ! Un événement bleu blanc rouge s'apprête à embraser la galaxie lors de jeux bourrés d'action. Alors, soyez au rendez-vous pour ne rien rater !

  • Des boîtes bonus aux couleurs de la France dériveront dans l'espace toute la journée.
  • Disponible en magasin : munitions feux d'artifice
  • Infiltration (13h - 15h)
  • Portail Invasion de niveau : 1, 2, 3 (16h – 18h)
  • Crazy Cubi (19h – 22h)
  • Drones sont immunisés contre les dégâts !
Montrez à vos ennemis qu'ils sont tous égaux à vos yeux en n'en épargnant aucun !

¡Hola pilotos!

Una vez más celebramos el día de la Constitución Mexicana en DarkOrbit. ¡No te lo pierdas!

Tendremos Cajas Bono especiales todo el día junto con los juegos Spaceball a las 14:00 y Capture the Beacon a las 19:00 hora local del servidor.

¡Te esperamos!

Hallo Space-Piloten,

jetzt geht's los: Heute wird in DarkOrbit gefeiert, bis die Milchstraße brennt, es ist Vatertag! Seid dabei und zischt mit Euren Spacepiloten-Kumpeln um den intergalaktischen Block - bei so viel Action bleibt kein Auge trocken! Das Level Invasion Gate wartet von 13:00 bis 15:00 Uhr auf Euch, von 16:00 bis 18:00 Uhr wird es nochmals frostig im All, geht auf die Jagd nach Ice Meteroids! Zum Ausklang könnt Ihr von 19:00 bis 22:00 Uhr dann noch bei dem Infiltration-Event ein paar Feinde aufspüren und vernichten.

Also, macht Euch auf die Jagd nach den speziellen Bollerwagen-Bonus-Boxen, die nur heute durchs All holpern und nehmt keine Rücksicht auf Verluste – am Herrentag nehmen Eure Drohnen keinen Schaden!
Darkorbit’te daha fazla TP ve ŞP kazanın!

Merhaba Uzay Pilotları,

19 Mayıs Atatürk'ü Anma Gençlik ve Spor Bayramınızı ona yaraşır şekilde kutluyoruz! Tüm DarkOrbit oyuncularımız bu bayrama davetlidir!

Tüm gün boyunca %25 daha fazla tecrübe ve şeref puanı kazanma fırsatı sizlerle! Ayrıca oyundaki Bonus kutuları Türk Bayrağı ile süsleniyor! Bu şöleni kaçırmayın!
Forum

Merhaba Uzay Pilotları,

Mustafa Kemal Atatürk önderliğinde kazanılan Milli Mücadele ile tarihte eşine çok az rastlanır bir başarı gerçekleştirilmiştir. Mustafa Kemal Atatürk’ü ve silah arkadaşlarını, canından aziz bildiği vatanı için kanlarını bu toprağa dökmüş şehitlerimizi rahmet ve minnetle bir kez daha yad ediyoruz.

Bu bayramda da havai fişekler, kıran kırana maçlar ve muhteşem ödüller Türkiye sunucularında sizi bekliyor!

Gözünüz harika ödüller içeren Türk bayraklı avantaj kutularında olsun.
Get the best value Discounts, Advantages and Premium Accounts. Right now!

Greetings Pilot!

DarkOrbit is offering a multitude of fabulous opportunities for Veteran Pilots and New Recruits. With valuable Subscriptions, resplendent Rebates, illustrious Uridium and superb Special Offers to tempt you all:

Doubler / XL Doubler Advantage Packs

Double up the rewards from each and every Booty Box. Subscribe now for a period of one week or why not treat yourself to eight week of additional treasures!

Rebate / XL Rebate Advantage Packs

Shopping has never been more rewarding with a “Rebate Advantage Pack”. Purchase one for either a single week or an eight-week period and save on all in-game Uridium puchases.

Uridium / XL Uridium Advantage Packs

You want Uridium? You’ve got it when you grab this offer and get 10,000 Uridium automatically for one or eight weeks, without having to worry about any special offers.

1/6/12 mo Premium – Enjoy the good things in life with special bonuses every pilot needs including:
  • 5% off all Uridium purchases (bonus stacks with Rebate Advantage Pack)
  • 2 additional Action Bars
  • 50% shorter rocket reload time
  • Free ship and P.E.T. repairs anywhere, 50% off drone repairs
  • Automatic resource refining, access to all radar CPU advantages, 500 extra units of cargo space
  • +100% repair robot efficiency
  • 5-second logout
There’s never been a better time to fly to victory!
Stay on top of the News
Follow us on the 'net and get all the background information and more!

Hi Spacepilots!

Follow DarkOrbit on all relevant gaming channels to stay on top of the news. Chat with the team, give us your feedback and get all the nitty-gritty about your favorite game.

The DarkOrbit team is present on the following channels:
  • Discord live chat - instant contact to the team and your friends
  • Twitch.tv - regular live streams with the team
  • Facebook - pix, stories and stuff
  • @darkorbit - keep up to date with instant announcements
  • target="_blank">YouTube - archives of previous trailers, podcasts and Twitch streams
  • Forums (for your language forum, click on the "Forum" link at the bottom of the page)
Join us on your preferred channel to keep up-to-date with the game and all events.
Join the DarkOrbit Discord Community, and chat with other players, moderators and developers!

Greetings, pilots!

A new way to connect with fellow Pilots, moderators and developers is here - you can now join our Discord server for free by clicking here. Whether you are using the browser, client or mobile version of Discord, staying up to date with what’s going on has just become a whole lot easier. Make sure to enable desktop or push notifications to get the latest announcements as soon as they go live!

Moderated language chats, easy Q&A’s and a friendly and relaxed atmosphere await you, so we hope to see you online soon!

Hello Space Pilots,

We’ve received intel on the blueprints for pirate weapon systems found in the pirate booty. Several pilots have reported finding pieces of a blueprint for producing a pirate drone.


Collect pieces blueprints for the pirate drone
Collect enough of these pieces from the pirate booty and you’ll be able to construct the pirate drone without any extra charge. If you're missing a piece of the blueprint, you can buy the missing piece for Uridium. Every piece you collect will decrease the price for instantly constructing the drone.

Constructing in the Tech Center
Once you've collected all the blueprint pieces you can start construction in the Tech Center. Here you can also see how many pieces of the blueprints that you've already collected and how much Uridium it would cost to build instantly.

Every pilot will receive: five blueprint pieces from their company to make the challenge of building a pirate drone easier.

Claim this pirate technology for yourself and put it to good use.

Greetings Space Pilots!

As some of you may have noticed, there seems to be more and more locked bonus boxes floating around space. They appear to be encrypted with some kind of special code to keep them locked.

We've got good news for you - these boxes can easily be cracked, but you're going to have to do it manually if you want to get at what's inside. Autopilot just won't cut it this time. Plus it will also help to keep the game fair for all hard-working pilots out there!



Here's an overview of the new bonus-box feature:

  • The bonus boxes are randomly encrypted.
  • To crack a box's lock, you just have to enter the correct code shown.
  • If you provide the correct code, the content of the next box you collect will be doubled.
  • If you enter the incorrect code, you will have to try again. You won't be able to continue collecting boxes until you've entered the correct code.



That's all for now, pilots! If you have any other questions or need more information on how to open the bonus boxes, then click on Forum to find the information you need in the FAQ.



See you in space,

Your DarkOrbit Team
Discover red and blue pirate booty!
Go hunt down colorful pirate booty - the rewards will astound you!

Hello Space Pilots,

On our reconnaissance flights we have discovered some special chests. It seems that it's special pirate cargo containing priceless items.

We've hidden a couple of these red and blue chests all about DarkOrbit. Our scientists have developed a few special booty keys to open up these mysterious chests. The keys are color coded - red and blue of course.

The red chests seem to have double the chance of winning a LF-4-Laser compared to the normal chests! Incredible! And the blue chests?? Well, our scientists have even calculated a three-fold increase of your chance at a LF-4-Laser! Not only that, but some of them contain special ships like the Spearhead, Aegis or the Citadel, while others still have the rare Havoc drone design!

It's not all rosy, though. Apparently these chests disappear after a limited time in Orbit. Be quick and start your search today!

Don't hesitate in getting the right key for the right chest in the payment section.

Happy collecting!
Sign up for the DarkOrbit newsletter now!
Never miss out on gift coupon codes or important intel again!

Greetings, Pilots!

Want to make sure you get every gift code while staying informed about the latest game news? Then sign up for the newsletter now in your DarkOrbit Account Center and validate your email address!
Get Unique Incentives with Friend Invites!
Improve your ship by inviting your friends to play DarkOrbit. Get unique and powerful Nostromo ship designs!

Greetings, Pilots!

Imagine for a moment getting LF-4 lasers and exclusive ship designs for free! Can it possibly be true?

Yes, it can! With our overhauled Friend Invite Bonus Program, you can now get amazing rewards just by inviting your friends to play DarkOrbit - for example, LF-4 lasers and exclusive designs. Make your Nostromo more powerful than you ever thought you could!

This is your chance to overpower your enemies with a little help from your friends! Invite your friends now: %FRIENDINVITELINK%!
PETLOOKZ™ - a new look for your P.E.T.

Greetings, pilots!

After the wildly successful introduction of the DRONELOOKZ™ system, M.A.S.Q.U.E. has done it again!

PETLOOKZ™ enables all P.E.T.s to be individually customized, meaning you no longer have to choose between style and stats!

The first designs are now available everywhere in human space:

Get ready for the Arctic, Green and Red P.E.T. skins!

PETLOOKZ™ will fit all P.E.T.s, so every pilot can easily equip the new designs.

Give yourself a P.E.T. you can be proud of by visiting the shop today.
SHIPLOOKZ™ - Now Live Across All Space!
From Drones to P.E.T.s, to Ships – M.A.S.Q.U.E. extends their palette of products once again.

Greetings, pilots!

Starting today, DarkOrbit offers you a new exciting range of customization options for your ship collection. Your benefits
  • Streamlined ship handling
  • Better overview of your ship collection
  • Clearer separation between ships, stats and designs
  • Fast access to ships and equipment
  • More design variety
You can enjoy the updated Ship Management system right now!
Please refer to the full documentation on our FAQ forums for details.
12 new Missions! Country Ship designs! Spaceball! Referee Bots!

Greetings, pilots!

Starting on Friday, the 10th of June (0:00h LST), DarkOrbit invites you to join a month of celebrating European football.

For the duration of the European football festival in France, we have organized football-themed events, 24 really cool country designs for your Champion Goliath, and a new “Championship” drone design.

You can also bet on your team’s performance in the daily matches with the Soccer Bonus.

Good Luck to you and your favorite team.
Who do you think will play against Germany in the final?

Greetings, pilots!

The Assembly has opened up many new opportunities to craft a variety of items, from consumables to exclusive ships and designs. We’re now adding a new set of complex and demanding blueprints, and a new set of special resources: “Hardware”. These “Hardware” items are used in rare designs, special ships, and even drone formations! You can create them from the basic resources scrap, mucosum, prismatium and plasmide. To launch the new blueprints, the “Project: Nano” event will be taking place! Get access to exclusive “Lava” designs for your Pusat and Spectrum, gain the ability to craft the Lance drone formation, and much more! From Monday, 25th of July 2016, midnight LST until Sunday, 7th of August 2016, 23:59h LST, new missions, event-exclusive blueprints, boxes, and more will make it easy for all players to learn about the new system. More information can be found on the forums in the FAQ section.

The extermination of M.A.S.Q.U.E., the Permafrost Fissure. Almost like someone else is out there, watching us, seeing how we react.
Well, pilots. We react to any threat. Prepare for any incursion into our space and are preparing to fight any new enemy. To that end, the specialists have been looking at the Unstable LF-4’s and have developed new designs based on these new elements. This new technology.
We are pleased to confirm that the LF-4 Magmadrill, Paritydrill and Hyperplasmoid will be available soon. Three unique designs to suit different needs.
Let’s show the enemy we have teeth!
This feature will be permanently available starting 23 February
The summary
  • New Daily and Weekly Quests
  • Customized LF-4 Enhancements
  • Magmadrill – Base Damage 212 + 5 Boost Damage PvP Only
  • Paritydrill – Base Damage 212 + 5 Boost Damage PvE only
  • Hyperplasmoid – Base Damage 212 + 0.5% HP Boost Per Laser
Could this be a sign of things to come?
Refractions: The first Cross-Server Zone is now open

Humanities need to master the universe is legendary. Breaking new barriers and achieving new goals.

The results can sometimes be unexpected!

Attempting to discover the secrets of an ancient alien artefact, scientists triggered a new region of space. A refraction of the universe itself, where all possibilities can happen and histories secrets will start to be revealed.

Now you can enter Refractions, the first permanent Cross-Server Zone for DarkOrbit. Allowing players from all servers to meet in epic PVP battles. Allowing you to fight for your faction’s best interests or your own and with a new set of quests dedicated to this new map.

For further information, please consult P G Harris (PhD) “On the nature of the Multiverse” (Mars University Press) or the Cross-Server Zone FAQ on the forums.
Click on the Triangular Logo in the game and play your part.

We’re delighted to tell you the Apocalypse Box has been refreshed. With all new drone designs! Fine pilots will recognize the opportunities every Apocalypse Box contains. With Poison Enigma, Ocean Enigma, Argon Enigma, Argon Hammerclaw and Argon Cyborg drones now available! Whether you buy your way to an opportunity or craft the keys yourself. The opportunity is there for the taking! Apocalypse Key Assembly Recipe Scrap – 20 Aurus – 10 Schism – 5 5 Seconds Craft Time
  • Full Loot List Available in Your Forum
  • Keys can be crafted, or purchased in the shop under extras


Crafting materials are available as drops from Saimon and Mordon (Scrapium), Pirate NPCs from Interceptors to Battle Rays (Aurus) and guaranteed rewards for all GGs (Schism).

To craft 1 key you need 20 Scrap, 10 Aurus and 5 Schism.

Note: The Assembly recipe, the Apocalypse Booty Boxes, and the Schism drops are only available during the event. Alternatively, packs of 5 to 155 keys are available in the shop.
Red and Blue Booty Boxes Updated!

Great news, Pilots!

We’ve revamped the Red and Blue Booty Boxes to feature some highly sought-after items, including the rarest of P.E.T designs for the Mimesis, Cyborg and Hammerclaw. Add a chance of getting the ores for crafting the enhanced LF-4 and, we think you’ll agree, they’re awesome!

The Booty Boxes can be found on the maps and Red and Blue keys can be crafted in the assembly using the following items:

Red

  • 10 Scrap
  • 5 Aurus
  • 3 Schism

Blue

  • 20 Scrap
  • 10 Aurus
  • 5 Schism

The full list of box contents can be found on your forum.

Scrap can be found from Saimon and Mordon, Aurus can be found from all pirate NPC and Schism in GG rewards.

But also, you can buy packs of various amounts of keys in the Shop, under Extras.

Happy collecting!

Pilots, a whole series of missions have opened up in Refractions. Ones that will test your skills as a solo fighter or bring you head-to-head with the other factions.

Get ready for action, adventure and sweet rewards in the Cross Server Zone!

Pilots. You’re in for a treat! From now on, every month, we will have a Daily Login Bonus Calendar.

Running throughout every month, with steadily increasing rewards and special milestones, there are 25 bonuses to claim. This means you can miss a few days and still receive the grand prize – as long as you join us for at least 25 days a month.

There’s also a special bonus for any existing Premium players, on the 25th day they login.

The calendar will reset at the end of the month, so you’ll know how many days you have left to grab all the loot.

Enjoy!

The techs have been working overtime in the hangers to release the new P.E.T. upgrade, so you can enhance any P.E.T.

What you can get:
  • P.E.T. Level raised to 20.
  • New P.E.T. slots so you can fit more lasers and generators.
  • New gear. Sacrificial Flame – allowing you to aid a comrade in battle when you sacrifice your P.E.T.
There are also rumors that the designers have created some even better Protocols. But, we’ll need to wait and see if anything becomes available.
A Parasite Tide is crashing over humanity - will you become a willing host, or fight the spread of the disease?

Greetings, Pilots!

A strange new plague is spreading through the human population. Why is it making its victims act so out of character? Could it have something to do with the mysterious new alien species, whose appearance is so off-putting?

The Parasite Tide is crashing over DarkOrbit!

Will you manage to avoid being infected? Will you become a ministering angel, fighting the infection and curing your fellow players, all while taking the fight to the disgusting Gygerim? With your fellow humans turning against you as well as the new alien threat to meet, it's a perilous course to fly!

...Or will you become a willing host to their strange parasite offspring, allowing the faint whispers of alien instinct to guide your steps, spreading their contagious blessing to other ships, and resisting all serums and treatments? It's a dangerous line to tread!

Complete unique new missions for both infected and uninfected players, unlock new achievements and titles, meet and defeat horrifying new alien motherships - and if you have reached level 21, you'll find a whole new story arc of epic missions waiting for you to conquer!

When the Parasite Tide arrives, it's kill or cure.... or sometimes, both!
“The most hilarious event of the year!” (Prof. Emmet Farnsworth, Sc.D.)

One minute a faithful companion, the next minute a disruptive pest! The heroes of DarkOrbit are called on to help cyberneticist Dr. Confusius: during the creation of his newest P.E.T., a bug in the programming has caused his latest creation to go on the rampage.

Starting on the 21st of September, this two-week event promises a whole new level of excitement:
  • 14 new missions for both high-level and low-level pilots
  • A new “Attack of the Killer P.E.T.s” event gate for both Lv. 5-13 and Lv. 14+ players
  • 5 new achievements and titles
  • Special P.E.T. boxes, packages and sales
Can you fix the bug and make space safe again?

Greetings, pilots!

Free from being the contractually exclusive technology partner for SecuriTek, M.A.S.Q.U.E. surprised leading journalists this week with invitations to their first intergalactic “SpaceTech Summit” to discuss their future plans. During their keynote, M.A.S.Q.U.E. salesperson Rupert van Koeken revealed that during their huge public launch event, pilots will be able to participate in a variety of activities and profit from special sales encompassing the whole range of M.A.S.Q.U.E.’s specialty products:
  • Enjoy exclusive M.A.S.Q.U.E. missions every day of the event
  • Join the M.A.S.Q.U.E. Bonus Box scavenger hunt
  • Get Red and Blue Booty Keys at special prices
  • Collect the Yamato and Defcom ships within the Kuiper Gate
The event will start on the 18th of April, 2016, at midnight, and will conclude on the 1st of May, 2016, at 23:59 LST. For more information about exact schedules, dates, and more, check out the official FAQ on our forums.
You remember the Helix? We’re betting you’ll forget about them soon enough.
Shining a Light in the Dark

Greetings, pilots!

During the Three-Day War in 2369, the crew of the International Space Station Prometheus took extreme action to destroy an invading Sibelon mothership. On that day, humanity learned that out beyond the limits of human space lay dangers far more threatening than our petty human disputes.

To commemorate this tragedy, MMO, EIC, and VRU signed the “Prometheus Day Treaty,” simplifying trade between the factions and opening up their markets to all mankind.

This weekend, we’re celebrating the event by opening up the doors to their combined arsenals.

Sales change daily and include:
  • Ship Design packages
  • Item sales (Booty Key, P.E.T.s, Ammunition, etc.)
  • Extra energy
  • Subscriptions
  • Ghostifier and Halloween Drone Designs
  • Special Uridium + Premium packages
And to make the best use of the extended Bonus Box Doublers, different Bonus Boxes can be collected every day (Helix, P.E.T., UBA, and Halloween).
Come back daily to discover the offer of the day!

Celebrate the sacrifice of the Prometheus crew during the Three-Day War when they destroyed the incoming Sibelon threat and ended the war. To commemorate this tragedy, MMO, EIC, and VRU signed the “Prometheus Day Treaty,” simplifying trade between the factions and opening up their markets to all mankind.

  • 6 exclusive missions (4 Daily, 2 Epic)
  • 6 awesome sets of Prometheus Fragments, with special Premium and Platinum Fragment sets, with additional prizes!
  • Pramantha Booty Boxes, opened with Prometheus Fragments giving a selection of scintillating prizes.
  • 10% Chance of an Argon Solace, Argon Venom Design when you complete the Alpha, Beta or Gamma Gates
Hitac Lottery, Fresh From the Freezer
Cool prices, icy action, and flash-frozen aliens - the Hitac invasion is deeply chill!

Greetings, pilots!

It's a warm and fuzzy feeling to know that Hitac motherships can be depended on to return, alongside their minions, for some nice predictable death and plunder-- what? What do you mean, they've changed?! Alert, all pilots: scouts from all Companies are reporting seemingly indestructible ice armor enveloping the Hitac invaders' ships.

Indestructible? Hah! That's not a word in our vocabulary. Charge!

Destroy the Frost Hitac motherships to acquire the coveted capsules to be used in the lottery. Or focus on the frost minions, who drop letters - once you can put together the word "FROST", you can earn a capsule that way.

Then, visit the Uridium page to feed your capsules into the frost converter and try your luck in the Hitac Lottery. The prizes that await you are beyond cool - from new arctic ship designs to a mysterious Ice Portal to sweet LF4 laser package deals to the chance to win a million Uridium!

Good luck!
An arctic Hitac event fresh out of the deep freeze
Keep a cool head and you, too, can make a killing from the frosty Hitac Lottery!

Battle stations!

A Hitac invasion is on its way. If we can trust the rumors, their arrival is changing the very appearance of deep space in our reality!

One thing is certain: there are some seriously cool new prizes to be won in the Hitac Lottery! Resist the Hitac invasion, be diligent in gathering up capsules, and exchange them for lottery tickets in the frost converter.

Don't miss your chance at the new arctic ship designs! In addition, a mysterious Ice Portal, LF4 laser bundles, a million Uridium, and many more possible prizes await you.

Enjoy the frostiest Hitac event ever!
Nothing is as it seems: this year's carnival is a real M.A.S.Q.U.E.rade!

Greetings, pilots!

Just in time for Carnival, it's a galaxy-wide masquerade! Look for all your favorite Carnival festivities, from fireworks to Carnival Boxes to WIZ-X Rockets, and meet the enigmatic spokesperson for the tech concern M.A.S.Q.U.E., who is here with a few lucrative missions you won't want to miss!

That's not all: there's a special season starting in the Ultimate Battle Arena, sponsored by M.A.S.Q.U.E., who are offering up their brand-new DRONELOOKZ (tm) as prizes! That's right: you, too, will be able to choose to have your drones look one way and act another with this cosmetic tech - and if the UBA isn't your speed, look for them in the shop!

It's a mad M.A.S.Q.U.E.rade; dress up your drones and have a wonderful Carnival!
SecuriTek and M.A.S.Q.U.E. are squaring off!

Greetings, pilot!

It looks like the start of a very lucrative friendship between yourself and the enigmatic person behind the Scaramouche mask! Now that you've caught M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s eyes, you can be sure that some sexy new tech will regularly find its way to you, as you help them in their struggle against sabotage by SecuriTek, their previous exclusive employers.

Enjoy a fortnight of fireworks and fun as you hunt alien eggs, participate in a special UBA season with exclusive new rewards, and new epic missions! And you'll be able to take advantage of M.A.S.Q.U.E.'s amazing PETLOOKZ system with two new cosmetic P.E.T. designs, each in several colors.

Celebrate spring with sheer, exuberant deep-space mayhem!

Greetings, pilots!

It’s never quiet in space.

Humanity has encountered many hostile races in the depths of space. We just drove the Hitac back to their pocket of space and are now facing a new threat: The Saimon have amassed an army far greater than we imagined they could muster.

Starting on the 12th of September, it’s your task to join the human forces and repel the attack.

The Saimon Rebellion event introduces
  • The new Scatter Laser – a shotgun-style craftable weapon
  • A new Fusion Shield Generator – slightly weaker with faster out-of-combat recovery
  • New Pusat and Spectrum designs (Blaze, Ocean, and Legend)
  • Ability balancing update for Diminisher, Lightning, Sentinel, Solace, Spectrum and Venom
  • New UBA, Gate and Box rewards including new recipes
  • New Event missions
The event is scheduled to run for two weeks, so you have plenty of opportunity to collect all the cool stuff and find out more about the Saimon Rebellion.

Get to the FAQ section of our forums for details on the event, the recipes and much, much more!
Everyone’s favorite spine-chilling Halloween Event returns!

Greetings Space Pilots,

Come and celebrate the return of the Halloween event. With even spookier goings on:
  • The terrifying Tunnel of Terror is back!
  • Enjoy ghoulishly good new Halloween drone designs, the Ghostifier Item, the Pumpkin Boxes and the Ghost NPC.
  • The haunting Halloween specific titles are available again!
But that’s not all!

We’re adding the following eerie new content:
  • New Item: Spectral Lancer Lasers (does additional damage against aliens)
  • New permanent recipes: Short Term Boosters (1h versions)
  • Chimera, Phantom, Mirage and Enigma Blaze, Borealis and Sandstorm designs (only available during the event)
  • Some seriously, satisfying Booty Box reward changes.
The event starts on the 17th of October 2016, 0:00h LST and ends on October, 31st, 23:59h LST.
Don’t let the boogeyman get you!
Still Going Strong - Happy 10th Birthday DarkOrbit
Celebrate our 10th Birthday and join us for the Winter Season. It’s gonna be a blast!

We breathed life into the first DarkOrbit server on the 11th December 2006. Since then our marvelous sci-fi game has gone through several changes, with the promise of more awesome things to come.

So let’s kick-off with something special.

From the 1st December 2016, you can enjoy the following Birthday and Winter Event’s features:
  • Goliath-X: A stunning new addition to your fleet
  • Cold Wave 2016: Missions for everyone – old and new
  • Demaner Hunt reloaded: They’re stronger and sturdier than before, but so much more rewarding
  • The Breach: The “birthday gate” will open on the 11th December
  • Shadow Dance: A brilliant new quest line which may change the DarkOrbit universe – for ever!
  • and more: Life-time achievement titles, new designs for ships, drones and P.E.T.s, Ice Meteroids, Assembly recipes
The event will end on the 31st of December 2016, 23:59h LST.
All the details are listen in the 10-year-anniversay FAQ on our forums.

A star quake has ripped open a Subglacial Fissure to hitherto uncharted areas of the galaxy. With new elements, scientists think will unlocked a new era in physics and weapon development.

They’ve already crafted some of these elements into the Unstable LF-4. Developed and made available to every pilot brave enough to enter the Subglacial Fissure.

Embark on dangerous and rewarding missions, craft your own “Subglacial CPU”, to enter the fissure and collect all the materials required to create the new Unstable LF-4. Be wary though, pilot. You’re not the only species who are seeking these elements.

The event starts on the 24th of January 2017 and will end on the 28th of February, 23:59h LST. The summary
  • New missions to get you started
  • New Subglacial Fissure Gate
  • New CPU to open your own Gate
  • New “Unstable LF-4” – the same basic stats as regular LF-4 but with a bit of variance in their DMG output
  • New Boosters: Proxium drop chance , Proxium reward and the combined “Ultimate Proxium Booster”

The plague spreads, as the threat to humanity intensifies. Nyx returns, with a serious message from the UNN, trying to help uncover the reasons for this new threat and uncovering something more. As other aliens start to fall under the curse. Pilots, it is time to gear up and prevent this threat once again.

A new quest line, with standard and an enhanced LF-4 as quest rewards, sends you to kill the infected aliens to release Blighted Gygerthralls, containing valuable Hybrid Alloy.
Craft the Immunizer CPU to access to the Quarantine Zone and take the battle to all-new enemies!

A new boss lurks inside the Quarantine Zone. Those who are victorious in killing it will gain a number of rewards, including the rare Indoctrine Oil for the Mimesis, Hammerclaw and Cyborg: As well as Ore Packages which contain resources needed for LF-4 enhancements.
However make no mistake, this new boss will not go down without a fight.

Engage in Nyx’s quests to uncover more details of what’s going on and be prepared to battle in Plague Alert!

Let’s raise a glass to DarkOrbit and celebrate with a Winter event which is packed with classic goodies. As well as celebrating our 11th Birthday with the ever popular Skoll Gate

From the events launch you can enjoy the following Birthday and Winter Event’s features:
  • Winter Daily Login Bonus: With some special designs to celebrate.
  • Cold Wave: Missions for everyone – old and new.
  • Skoll Gate: The “birthday gate” will open on our birthday.
  • and more: Life-time achievement titles and Ice Meteroids.
Time to get ready for action!

Are you ready to enter the Skoll Gate, back by popular demand to celebrate our 11th Birthday.

If you play the Skoll Gate and face the waves of wintry opponents you could win:
  • Ice Rockets.
  • Indoctrine Oil.
  • Enhanced LF-4's.
With two levels of difficulty to challenge you! There's plenty of action to be had.

May the festival of lights be the harbinger of joy and prosperity!

Greetings, pilots!

In order to celebrate the Sugar Festival, we also have super tasty event planned for you! We offer rare packages specially designed Ramadan Feast. We combined 50% Bonus Experience and 50% Bonus Honor Points into one package and added rare Lance Drone Formation into your favourite Tiered Spender Event. Galaxy Gates Double Day, Turkey Bonus Boxes and many more are awaiting you... Jump into forum for event calendar and detailed information! Forum
The four sweetest days in DarkOrbit!

Greetings, pilots!

The end of Ramadan is approaching, so it’s time for us to join in the Sugar Feast celebrations! All over the world, communities celebrate the end of their month of fasting by feasting and enjoying sweet treats. This festival is called Eid al-Fitr. Our special treat for you is the Goliath Surgeon, which is included in this weekend’s Uridium package sales. And, to make it extra sweet, we have re-released the Lance drone formation!
  1. 15,000 Uridium and 2 weeks Premium
  2. 30,000 Uridium and 2 weeks Premium plus 1 week rebate advantage package
  3. 75,000 Uridium, 1 week Premium plus 1 month rebate advantage package
  4. 150,000 Uridium, 500 Extra Energy, one Hercules design plus one Goliath Surgeon
  5. 330,000 Uridium, 500 Extra Energy, one Hercules design, one Goliath Surgeon, 1 month of Premium and Lance drone formation!

In honor of our fallen heroes, and to support his family in their time of great loss, DarkOrbit is proud to announce the Fatsali Kerem Bundle. Each package contains:
  • G –Champion Ship Design
  • Hezarfen Ship Design
  • Phantom Blaze Drone Design x 10
All proceeds for this bundle will be donated to charity!

Spin the wheel for Goliath designs, booster packages, or even LF-4s!

Greetings, pilots!

When you spin the wheel to build your Galaxy Gate, today you’ll also have a chance to receive something special:

We have tweaked the drop packages a bit, so in addition to the popular possibilities to win ammo, repair vouchers, etc., today, with every spin you could win:
  • LF-4
  • Random booster for 10 hours
  • Random Goliath skill design
Topping off the Galaxy Gate rewards!

Greetings, pilots!

M.A.S.Q.U.E.’s R&D department is churning out a lot of special gear lately! Using their patented GateDropz™ military-grade locators, they have found pockets of hidden space in certain Galaxy Gates that can yield extra rewards for space pilots venturing into them.

As it requires a high amount of vacuum energy, the duration for which this equipment works is limited!

This weekend, from midnight on Friday through to Sunday at 23:59 LST, all pilots will have a chance to win special rewards for finishing the selected Gates!

Here’s what you could win:
  • Delta Gate: One LF-4
  • Epsilon Gate: Collector's joy - Chimera and Phantom
  • Kuiper Gate: Goliath surprise pack
  • Lambda Gate: Collector's joy - Mirage and Enigma

  • Awesome Drones: Havoc, Hercules, Elite Demon, or Silver Demon drone design

Join your faction in battle and take on your rivals to find out who is really behind the recent attacks on humanity.

Climb the leaderboards and earn valuable rewards for you and your whole faction during DarkOrbit’s Blightstorm: Battle for Influence event!

Brilliant work! We expected nothing less but you’ve really shown the other factions who’s boss. Now we’ll interrogate any captives and see if we can prove they’re to blame for the recent attacks. Meanwhile, keep an eye out for any reprisals.

We’re Bound for Victory!

Good job pilot, the MMO is delighted with your actions and you’ve certainly shown the enemy forces who’s in charge. While we sift through the wreckage to find evidence of their involvement in heinous crimes we’d like you to keep your eyes peeled for any further threats.

Remember: Union is Power!

Nice work my friend. Your actions have caused great celebrations in the VRU command center. Now we’ll check the warzones and see if we can prove the other factions were behind the recent attacks. Keep doing great work out there.

Keep Transforming the Future!
Bring the galaxy under your control!

It’s time for a real killer adventure! One that will bring you to the verge of despair.

Strengthen the influence of your Company! Prove your superiority! Trust only your comrades and your skills as pilots!

Domination Event
  • Achieve Domination status for your faction by capturing the Domination Beacons on Battle Maps and gaining Domination Points!
  • Conquer all Domination Beacons on a Battle Map to build a Clan Battle Station for even more Domination Points!
  • Your Company needs 9 Domination Points to dominate the Battle Maps, providing their pilots with massive advantages and great bonuses!
Domination starts in a week – prepare yourself!

Times are tough and the Companies rattle their sabers. A new conflict is imminent – seize control!

Head into battle. Team up with your comrades and strengthen the power of your Company to gain their trust and glorious riches!

The Ministry returns and the hunt for the Demaner is on once more. Help them gather information to aid their plans as you battle against these new, tougher Demaner.

Can the Ministry's message of unity be trusted? Are you read for the challenge? Battle hard to be the best and receive valuable rewards as the future starts to be rewritten in Warbond: Demaner!

A cyber virus has spread through the companies, causing chaos. As you receive emergency transmissions from the EIC, MMO and VRU, it’s up to you to help each organization clear up their mess. Working for the enemy never proved so lucrative. Battle through 30 action packed missions, with three brand-new protocols to gain and a host of other prizes to win. It’s time to bring the P.E.T.s back under control!

It’s time to step up to the mark. Uber pirates have been seen gathering forces in the depth of space and Nyx warns this can mean only one thing. A powerful Pirate Raid!

There’s only one thing for it. Arm your ship and prepare for battle as you help Nyx rid the galaxy of this new threat. With fresh rewards, including Enhanced LF-4 ores for each Uber you defeat, there’s no better time to be on the winning side!

This hi-tech assault vessel combines superb firepower and speed

Greetings, pilots!

Setting out to shake up the ship market, M.A.S.Q.U.E.’s first ship has hit the streets: The Tartarus.

A well-balanced combination of superb firepower and exceptional potential for speed makes this a fine, top-of-the-line Assault vessel.

Tech specs Summary
  • Two new special abilities: “Rapid Fire” and “Speed Boost”
  • 14 Laser slots, 15 Generator slots
  • 260k HP, 220 Speed
  • Pilots with a full matching set of Chimera / Phantom designs will enjoy the Tartarus’ special visual effect. When the Speed Boost is activated, the P.E.T. and Drones dock with your ship.
Available in Hot-Fusion Red (default), Sunburst Orange (option) or Cool Mint (option), the Tartarus adds a missile launcher Rapid-Fire skill and a Speed Boost skill to every gourmet spice… errr… space pilot’s arsenal.

Greetings, pilots!

Fresh from the auto-forges of M.A.S.Q.U.E., the Mimesis offers a hotpot of delicious features: spicy skills and vivid visuals.

The Mimesis is the first choice for long-range scouts: Implementing a state-of-the-art holographic emitter and cleverly rerouting your ship’s energy lines, this ship is M.A.S.Q.U.E.’s reconnaissance specialist.

Tech specs Summary
  • Three new special abilities: “Hologram”, “Scramble”, “Phase Out”
  • 12 Laser slots, 12 Generator slots
  • 225k HP, 360 Speed
  • Full Set effect: Pilots owning a full set of Enigma drone designs and a Mirage P.E.T. designs will enjoy a special ship animation in the 3D version.
Available in Sun-Burst Orange (default), Hot-Fusion Red (option), Cool Mint (option), the Mimesis lets you get in, hide amongst the enemy and get out of harsh situations easily.
P.E.T. and Drone design sets available now

Greetings, pilots!

Tastes may vary, but no-one turns down the well-rounded appearance and utility of a full set of drones paired with their the matching P.E.T. design.

As announced during the M.A.S.Q.U.E. SpaceTech Summit, the tiger-orange Mirage P.E.T. design and Enigma drone design and the candy-apple red Chimera P.E.T. and Phantom drone designs are now available for purchase!

Both sets contain 10 drone designs along with the accompanying P.E.T. design.

Red and Blue Booty Box Update!

Great news, Pilots!

We've added even more content to the Red and Blue Booty Boxes, feature the usual highly sought items, but adding the Argon Mirage, Argon Cyborg, Argon Hammerclaw and Legend Mirage P.E.T Designs. Another awesome enhancement!

The Booty Boxes can be found on the maps and Red and Blue keys can be crafted in the assembly using the following items:

Red

  • 10 Scrap
  • 5 Aurus
  • 3 Schism

Blue

  • 20 Scrap
  • 10 Aurus
  • 5 Schism

The full list of box contents can be found on your forum.

Exciting Galaxy Gate action with even more rewards!

Our techs have found a way to conjure up extra rewards from 4 different Galaxy Gates. It only lasts for 24 hours and they are never quite sure exactly what the extra rewards will be until some brave pilots complete the gates and report back.

Do you have what it takes to complete one of these gates, and help our researchers find ways to grant even better rewards? You have until midnight tonight!

  • Delta Gate: Ship Design Package
  • Epsilon Gate: Collector's Joy - Chimera and Phantom
  • Streuner Gate: Goliath Surprise Pack
  • Lambda Gate: Collector's Joy - Mirage and Enigma
Package Contents You have a chance to win one of the following rewards from the corresponding package:
  • Ship Design Package: One LF-4 or 10,000 UCB-100
  • Awesome Drones: Havoc, Hercules, Elite Demon, or Silver Demon drone design
  • Collector's Joy - Chimera and Phantom: One Chimera or Phantom drone design (in either red, orange or green), or a pack of 10 Red Phantom + 1 Red Chimera designs
  • Collector's Joy - Mirage and Enigma: One Mirage or Enigma drone design (in either red, orange or green), or a pack of 10 Orange Enigma + 1 Orange drone designs
  • Goliath Surprise Pack: One Centaur, Peacemaker, Sovereign, Vanquisher, or Surgeon Goliath design. (Please keep in mind that should you already own one of these, you will not receive a duplicate identical design.)

We’ve tweaked the Ultimate Battle Arena Matchmaking so you can fight more fairly!

Greetings Ace Pilots!

We’ve tweaked the Ultimate Battle Arena (UBA) Matchmaking so you can fight more fairly!

Now the equipment installed in your ships slots plays a significant role in deciding who you'll be matched against.

The system also reduces the chance of being matched against the same opponent, multiple times in a row. Giving you a diverse array of different opponents to challenge you in the UBA.

There’s never been a better time to fly!

An infection is spreading. It’s targeting mankind. Uncover the root of the infection, craft powerful new vessels, and prepare for the coming war! During this event, infected HITACSs will be flying around different maps and spawn I-Eggs. Pilots, you must stop the outbreak, and help the research by collecting these I-Eggs and the items hidden within. You will be handsomely rewarded for your efforts, including the rare ores needed to craft the powerful new Enhanced LF4’s! This event will also mark the unveiling of the Mimesis, G-Cyborg and Hammerclaw! Three very different ships to engage the sharpest pilots in the fleet! Prepare for action! The summary

Can you become the Arena Champion?

It's time to test yourself in the Ultimate Battle Arena. Engage in furious 1 v 1 matches in order to gain Arena points, and earn a spot in the top 50 to be eligible for rewards at the end of the season. The rewards pool has been updated to include the rare ores needed to craft the new powerful Enhanced LF-4s. For a full FAQ, and updated rewards list, please visit your local forum. The DarkOrbit team would like to wish every pilot a happy Easter weekend! To thank you for your support, we have set up a login bonus that was booked as soon as you signed in.

The package consists of 1 week of premium membership, 500 ACM Mines, and 5,000 Xenomit. On top of this, we have activated a one-time payment discount code for 15% off one purchase. Use the code EASTER17 at checkout to take advantage.

Login bonus and Discount code valid from 13.04 – 17.04

As the edges of humanity begin to crumble, pirates raid our outposts.

Arm yourself and challenge them in deadly combat to become a Pirate Hunt destroyer! Aiding your clan, supporting humanity and wiping the scum from the face of the galaxy. With Premium membership, enhanced LF-4’s and more as rewards.

Time to fight!

Pilots, sources have confirmed that the rift to the Quarantine Zone has stabilized, making further infection a permanent threat. It’s time to fight to save humanity!

With boosters that only drain in gameplay time, additional rewards and a potential jackpot for those defeating the Gygerthrall Overlord it’s time to get back in the action!

The techs continue to make advances, and have now found a way to assemble a powerful new drone. The Spartan drone can be built using Hercules and Havoc designs combined with Schism, and will give you a boost to damage, shield, and HP.
  • Full FAQ available in your local forum
  • Spartan blueprint available via completion of the Kronos Gate
  • Increased drop chance of Havoc drones in the Zeta Gate
  • Increased drop chance of Hercules drones in the Kappa Gate

Open each door on the Solar Calendar and receive a selection of exceptional booty, including Indoctrine Oil and Tetrathrin.

Login daily, open a new window and find out what prize you’ve received. Miss a day and you’ll miss that days prize, so better come back daily and grab what’s on offer.
Ramazan bereketiyle geldi. 24 gün boyunca çeşitli hediye ekipman ve malzemelerin yer alacağı Ramazan ayına özel takvim sizlerle.

Güneş Takvimindeki her bir kapıyı aç ve Indoctrine Oil, Tetrathrin ve bir HiperPlazmoit LF-4 dahil çeşitli, olağanüstü ganimetleri kazan.

Her gün oyuna gir, yeni bir pencere aç ve hangi ödülü kazandığını öğren. Bir günü kaçırırsan o günün ödülünü de kaçıracaksın; bu yüzden her gün uğrayarak kampanyadan yararlanman senin için iyi olur.

Pilot, are you up to a challenge? As the Vortex of Terror has opened and humanity is under threat!

Optimize your experience by undertaking missions for Nyx, enter the vicious Vortex of Terror and battle the enemies within, as the Revenant Slender seek to enter human realms to feast on their soul energy.

Are you ready to take on the nightmare realm? We bet you are!
